TEXT.S: Chuck Aleksinas sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas te 1959, byacing te 2 ru 26 ryax qu hintgan nya, kinhulan nya ga Litchfield, Connecticut, hiya ga mnanak na ppzuy mari waya, ru squliq ka ppkal mari waya. 211 kunbun kinwagiq nya, 118 kunkin kin'suw nya, hiya ga qutux nqu spzyang blaq na ppzuy mari NBA. kawas 1982 mnwayaw ppzuy mari ga, mzyup squ te qutux lahuy ru te magal squliq, galun nqu Chicago Bulls.
